"It was definitely a special night," Linas Kleiza said. I will remember this night for the rest of my life. The Nuggets have been searching for a consistent third scorer behind Anthony Atkinson and Allen Iverson , and Linas Kleiza filled the role Thursday. the largest, most successful and influential publicly traded companies in the world. His role has often been described as providing "adult supervision" at a company whose young co-founders like to do things in unconventional ways. Eric Schmidt has a great track record and has really steered Google to great success, said Gartner analyst Ray Valdes. Eric Schmidt , who previously had been Novell CEO and Sun CTO, has been the public face of Google with his calm, relaxed demeanor, while running the company as a "triumvirate

my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come," Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Page said. " Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him." The change in command overshadowed Google Inc.
